class.name: de.amberhome.objects.TabLayoutWrapper
class.event: TabSelected(Index as int, SelectedTab as String, Tag as Object)

method.name: SetTabTextColors
method.comment: Set the Colors for a Tab.

method.name: DesignerCreateView
method.comment: This method is only for the B4A Designer. Don't call it directly

method.name: SetTabCustomView
method.comment: Set a Custom View for a Tab

method.name: GetTabText
method.comment: Get the Tab text.

method.name: SetTabsFromContainer
method.comment: Setup the Tabs from a PageContainer (AHViewPager library)

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object

method.name: AddTab
method.comment:
Add a Tab to the TabLayout.
Text - Text for the Tab Icon - Icon for the Tab (optional) Tag - Tag for the Tab (optional)

method.name: SetTabTag
method.comment: Set a tag value for the Tab.

method.name: SetViewPager
method.comment: Connect the Tabs with a ViewPager

method.name: SetLayout
method.comment: Changes the View position and size.

method.name: GetTabTag
method.comment: Get the tag value from a Tab.

method.name: AddTab2
method.comment:
Add a Tab to the TabLayout.
Text - Text for the Tab Icon - Icon for the Tab (optional) Tag - Tag for the Tab (optional)

method.name: SetVisibleAnimated
method.comment: Fade the view in or out

method.name: RemoveTabAt
method.comment: Remove a Tab

method.name: Invalidate3
method.comment: Invalidate part of the object

method.name: Invalidate2
method.comment: Invalidate a rectangualar part of the object

method.name: SetColorAnimated
method.comment: Animate the color to a new value

method.name: SelectTab
method.comment: Make a tab selected

method.name: SetTabText
method.comment: Set the Tab text.

method.name: RemoveAllTabs
method.comment: Remove all Tabs

method.name: SetTabIcon
method.comment: Set the Tabs Icon

method.name: SetLayoutAnimated
method.comment:
Similar to SetLayout. Animates the change. Note that the animation will only be applied when running on Android 3+ devices.
Duration - duration of the layout change

property.name: TabMode
property.comment: Set the Tab Mode (MODE_FIXED or MODE_SCROLLABLE)

property.name: Left
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's left position

property.name: TabCount
property.comment: Get Number of Tabs in the TabLayout.

property.name: TabIndicatorHeight
property.comment: Sets the indicator height of the selected tab

property.name: TabIndicatorColor
property.comment: Sets the indicator color for the selected tab

property.name: TabGravity
property.comment: Set Tab Gravity (GRAVITY_FILL or GRAVITY_CENTER)

property.name: Elevation
property.comment: Sets or gets the Elevation

property.name: Top
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's top position

property.name: Height
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's height

property.name: Width
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's width

class.designerProperty: key:TabIndicatorHeight, displayname:Tab Indicator Height, fieldtype:int, defaultvalue:2, minrange:0
key:TabIndicatorColor, displayname:Tab Indicator Color, fieldtype:color, defaultvalue:0xfff0f8ff, description:Use #FFF0F8FF for default color (Accent color)
key:TabMode, displayname:Tab Mode, fieldtype:string, defaultvalue:Fixed, list:Fixed|Scrollable
key:TabGravity, displayname:Tab Gravity, fieldtype:string, defaultvalue:Fill, list:Fill|Center

method.name: SetAction
method.comment: Sets the (optional) action for the Snackbar

method.name: Dismiss
method.comment: Dismiss the Snackbar

method.name: isInitialized
method.comment: Check if the object is initialized

method.name: Show
method.comment: Shows the Snackbar

method.name: Initialize
method.comment:
Initializes a Snackbar. A snackbar always has a parent view which can be the Activity or a panel.
EventName - Name for the click event for the (optional) action Parent - parent view. (The Activity or a Panel) Text - text to show. Duration - DURATION_SHORT, DURATION_LONG or a time in milliseconds.

property.name: Duration
property.comment: Sets or gets the duration how long the Snackbar will be shown

property.name: Text
property.comment: Update the text for the Snackbar.

property.name: View
property.comment: Returns the base view for the Snackbar. This can be the main Activity or a Panel.

method.name: RemoveHeaderView
method.comment: Remove a previously added Header view

method.name: DesignerCreateView
method.comment: This method is only for the B4A Designer. Don't call it directly

method.name: AddHeaderView
method.comment:
Set a Header View
HeaderView - A View like a Panel which holds the header items. Height - The height of the HeaderView. Pass 0 for the default header height.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object

method.name: SetLayout
method.comment: Changes the View position and size.

method.name: GetHeaderView
method.comment: Get an added Header View

method.name: SetVisibleAnimated
method.comment: Fade the view in or out

method.name: SetItemIconColors
method.comment: Set the icon colors of the items, using different colors for the states.

method.name: Invalidate3
method.comment: Invalidate part of the object

method.name: Invalidate2
method.comment: Invalidate a rectangualar part of the object

method.name: SetItemTextColors
method.comment: Set the text colors of the items, using different colors for the states.

method.name: LoadLayout
method.comment:
Add a Header to the NavigationView using a B4A Layout file. The width will always be the NavigationDrawer width.
LayoutFile - A B4A Layoutfile with the header contents. Height - The height of the HeaderView. Pass 0 for the default header height.

method.name: SetColorAnimated
method.comment: Animate the color to a new value

method.name: SetLayoutAnimated
method.comment:
Similar to SetLayout. Animates the change. Note that the animation will only be applied when running on Android 3+ devices.
Duration - duration of the layout change

property.name: Left
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's left position

property.name: CheckedItem
property.comment: Make the menu entry with this Id the selected one

property.name: ItemTextColor
property.comment: Set the text color of the items, regardless of its state.

property.name: HeaderCount
property.comment: Gets the Header View count

property.name: Top
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's top position

property.name: ItemIconColor
property.comment: Set the icon color of the items, regardless of its state.

property.name: Height
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's height

property.name: Menu
property.comment: Returns the ACMenu object to access the NavigationView Menu.

property.name: ItemBackground
property.comment: Set the Item background. Using a StateListDrawable is possible here.

property.name: Width
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's width

class.name: de.amberhome.objects.NavigationDrawerWrapper
class.event: DrawerSlide (Position As Float, DrawerGravity as Int)
NavigationItemSelected (MenuItem as ACMenuItem, DrawerGravity as Int)

method.name: OpenDrawer2
method.comment:
Opens the Drawer with the given gravity.
Gravity - Gravity of the drawer

method.name: OpenDrawer
method.comment: Opens the Drawer

method.name: AddSecondaryDrawer
method.comment:
Add a second drawer to the NavigationDrawer. Only two drawers are supported.
Width - width of the new navigation drawer Gravity - gravity for the drawer

method.name: GetLockMode
method.comment:
Get the LockMode of the drawer. You can unlock it or lock it in open or closed state.
Gravity - Gravity of the drawer LockMode - Locking mode

method.name: CloseDrawer2
method.comment:
Closes the Drawer with the given gravity.
Gravity - Gravity of the drawer

method.name: Initialize
method.comment:
Initializes the navigation drawer. The gravity for the drawer is GRAVITY_START.
EventName - Name of the event Panel - Parent panel for the navigation drawer. NavWidth - The width of the navigation panel.

method.name: IsDrawerOpen2
method.comment:
Check if the drawer is open.
Gravity - Gravity of the drawer

method.name: CloseDrawers
method.comment: Close all opened NavigationDrawers

method.name: GetDefaultHeaderHeight2
method.comment: Get the default header height for the primary or secondary drawer.

method.name: CloseDrawer
method.comment: Closes the Drawer

method.name: Initialize2
method.comment:
Initializes the navigation drawer with the given gravity.
EventName - Name of the event Panel - Parent panel for the navigation drawer. NavWidth - The width of the navigation panel. Gravity - The Gravity for the drawer (START, END)

method.name: SyncState
method.comment: Sync the state of the Drawertoggle with the current state of the Drawer(s).

method.name: InitDrawerToggle
method.comment: Initialize the DrawerToggle item. This enables the DrawerToggle 3 lines to back arrow animation in the Toolbar.

method.name: SetLockMode
method.comment:
Set the LockMode of the drawer. You can unlock it or lock it in open or closed state.
Gravity - Gravity of the drawer LockMode - Locking mode

method.name: IsDrawerOpen
method.comment: Check if the drawer is open.

property.name: DefaultHeaderHeight
property.comment: Returns the default height for the header view calculated with a 16:9 ratio and the default navigation drawer width.

property.name: NavigationView
property.comment: Gets the primary NavigationView

property.name: SecondaryNavigationView
property.comment: Gets the secondary NavigationView

property.name: DefaultDrawerWidth
property.comment: Returns the default navigation drawer width for the device and current screen resolution.

class.name: de.amberhome.objects.FloatlabelEditTextWrapper

class.designerProperty: key:HintColor, displayname:Hint Color, fieldtype:color, defaultvalue:0xfff0f8ff, description:A value of 0xfff0f8ff will keep the default color of the view
key:InputType, displayname:Input Type, fieldtype:string, defaultvalue:TEXT, list:DECIMAL|NONE|NUMBERS|PHONE|TEXT
key:CounterMaxLength, displayname:Counter Max Length, fieldtype:int, minrange:0, defaultvalue:100
key:ShowPasswordToggle, displayname:Show Password Toggle, fieldtype:boolean, defaultvalue:false
key:ForceDoneButton, displayname:Force Done Button, fieldtype:boolean, defaultvalue:false
